meanings.definition: A bulging of the rectum into the vagina.
meanings.sent1: She felt discomfort due to rectoceles.
meanings.sent2: Rectoceles can cause problems with bowel movements.
meanings.sent3: The rectoceles made her feel like she had a secret compartment.
meanings.sent4: The rectoceles were like a hidden treasure chest in her body.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained rectoceles as a bulging of the rectum into the vagina.

meanings.definition: A condition in which the rectum protrudes into the back wall of the vagina.
meanings.sent1: Rectoceles can be uncomfortable for some women.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with rectoceles after the examination.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her rectoceles were trying to escape through the wrong door.
meanings.sent4: The rectoceles felt like a secret tunnel connecting two parts of her body.
meanings.sent5: The image of rectoceles protruding into the back wall of the vagina stuck in her mind.
